text:
It's a celebration! Paris Hilton's younger brother, Barron Hilton II, has officially tied the knot with his long-time girlfriend, socialite Tessa Gräfin von Walderdorff. The two, who were joined by the entire Hilton clan, jetted off to St. Barts to celebrate their nuptials—and the photos look stunning.

Barron's other big sister, Nicky Hilton Rothschild, shared a photo of the newlyweds kissing outside the church, writing in her caption, "It's official!"

Nicky posted some photos of the couple's big day to her Instagram story, including snapshots of the pool at the reception, the bride in her gorgeous gown and one of Paris—who was chosen as DJ for the reception!

Nicky Hilton Rothschild via Instagram

Nicky Hilton Rothschild via Instagram

Nicky Hilton Rothschild via Instagram

Nicky Hilton Rothschild via Instagram

The proud big sister also snapped a series of pictures of the couple before they walked down the aisle. Nicky shared a super sweet one in particular of the two hugging, with the caption "ooh young love! can’t wait to see these two walk down the aisle! 💘"

Before getting ready for her DJ-ing gig, Paris Hilton shared a few shots from the couple's big day on her Instagram story, adding one of the entire family: parents Richard and Kathy Hilton, Tessa and Barron, Nicky and James Rothschild and her own fiancé, Chris Zylka. She captioned the shot, "Love my beautiful Family. 😍"
title: Paris Hilton's Younger Brother Barron Hilton is Married!

meta_data.description: And of course, his big sister Paris Hilton had an extra special role at the reception
